text: Karl Fritz Lauer (April 11, 1938 - June 5, 2018) was a Romanian-German Agricultural Scientist in Phytopathology and Herbology.Karl Fritz Lauer in the List of Visiting Scientists in the Agraruniversiy Timisoara He was born in Săcălaz (German Sackelhausen), Kingdom of Romania. After relocation to the German Federal Republic in 1981 he first worked as a scientist at the Botanical Institute of the University of Regensburg before taking over the management of the scientific field research for southern Germany for Rhône- Poulenc from 1983 to 1995. Lauer died in Leonberg, Baden-Württemberg, Germany on June 5, 2018 at the age of 80.Obituary Prof. Dr. Dr. h c Karl Fritz Lauer ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Romanian biologists Category:German academics Category:German botanists
title: Karl Fritz Lauer
